mosais.controller

Class Mosais

  • java.lang.Object
    • mosais.controller.Mosais

  • public class Mosais
extends java.lang.Object
    A program to add a mosaic effect to any image.
    Author:
    Andrew Trismen

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • start

        public void start(java.awt.image.BufferedImage image,
         int density,
         java.lang.String type,
         boolean pointsOnly)
        Start the mosaic generation, called from GUI.
        Parameters:
        image - Image to apply mosaic to.
        density - Magnitude of density of points in distribution.
        type - Type of distribution, Random or Uniform.
        pointsOnly - Whether to show only distribution points.

      • cleanUp

        private void cleanUp()
        To run after completing a run of processing. Nulls references to the data structures to save space and prepare for another run. Consider removing this and all cleanup code or improving
